alfredsnippet.snippet:
https://books.google.com/books?id=cV8h1NqNwksC&pg=PA10&dq=In+science,+explanations+must+be+based+on+naturally+occurring+phenomena.+Natural+causes+are,+in+principle,+reproducible+and+therefore+can+be+checked+independently+by+others&hl=en&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwj78pn9_bfWAhXrwVQKHR8wCp0Q6AEIKDAA#v=onepage&f=false

National Academy of Sciences (NAS), "Science, Evolution, and Creationism," 2008

"In science, explanations must be based on naturally occurring phenomena. Natural causes are, in principle, reproducible and therefore can be checked independently by others."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Scientific Explanations Must Be Based on Naturally Occurring Phenomena
